channel.title: How to add stuff about server to website!?
channel.description:
well idk if this is right section, but i need help so here it goes: how would i add a thing that says RaidScape is Currently (ONLINE OR OFFLINE) that updates itself.
another thing that says, there are currently _____ player on RaidScape.
thanks in advance.
